body_html:
Hi @soumith, my cudnn.h is version 7. This is what I have:

$ grep "_MAJOR" /usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h 
#define CUDNN_MAJOR 7
#define CUDNN_VERSION    (CUDNN_MAJOR * 1000 + CUDNN_MINOR * 100 + CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL)

But, I am going to try the fix suggested at #3567 as well.

body:
Hi @soumith, my cudnn.h is version 7. This is what I have:

```
$ grep "_MAJOR" /usr/local/cuda/include/cudnn.h 
#define CUDNN_MAJOR 7
#define CUDNN_VERSION    (CUDNN_MAJOR * 1000 + CUDNN_MINOR * 100 + CUDNN_PATCHLEVEL)
```

But, I am going to try the fix suggested at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3567 as well.
